title: Biden Issues New Order to Block Chinese Investment in Technology in the U.S.
description: The move, which is bound to heighten tensions with Beijing, reflects growing unease about China’s ability to access the personal information that Americans hand over to mobile apps and other services.

title: Is Partiful the Least Cringe Option to Get People to Your Event?
description: Partiful wants to be the go-to option for sending online invitations. Facebook events, we hardly knew ye.

title: Can ‘the Merge’ Save Crypto?
description: Many fans think it will. But it might end up creating some new problems.

title: Political Campaigns Flood Streaming Video With Custom Voter Ads
description: The targeted political ads could spread some of the same voter-influence techniques that proliferated on Facebook to an even less regulated medium.

title: Crypto’s Long-Awaited ‘Merge’ Reaches the Finish Line
description: Ethereum, the most popular cryptocurrency platform, completed its much-anticipated switch to a more energy-efficient infrastructure.
